AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the resources to read.

Beta.description: Whether to include phone numbers new to the Twilio platform. Can be: `true` or `false` and the default is `true`.

FriendlyName.description: A string that identifies the resources to read.

PhoneNumber.description: The phone numbers of the IncomingPhoneNumber resources to read. You can specify partial numbers and use '*' as a wildcard for any digit.

Origin.description: Whether to include phone numbers based on their origin. Can be: `twilio` or `hosted`. By default, phone numbers of all origin are included.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
